pr_title: Created classes for parsing certificates, keys and secrets identifiers.

timeline.message: Created model classes for certificates, keys and secrets identifiers.
Added support for deleted collections ("deletedcertificates", "deletedkeys" and "deletedsecrets").
Added more validity checks and modified unit tests.

timeline.bodyText: It is better to catch the MalformedURLException and wrap it with IllegalArgumentException with a custom message and attach the MalformedURLException as a cause.
timeline.author: g2vinay

timeline.bodyText: this can be refactored and made readable with String.format command.
